channel.title: PI Click npc dialogue
channel.description: Mk, so i've ben trying to work on this but doesn't really work out correctly. i need help so when i click on an npc it talks for example : i click on doric for him to talk to me to start a quest w.e i got dialogue inside of dialogue handler but, can anyone help

item.title: PI Click npc dialogue
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Do yu mean u click talk and it talks? if so:
Actionhandler.java

search for firstClickNpc

add the case (which is the npc id)
then the command to open the dialogue (cant remember what it is but you can copy it off other cases)
it will eventuate as:
case ###
DH.xxxxx

Read full topic
